if it was a device there he is being escorted ! hope it's just a story being escalated out of control ! and is not a device! sky news has said the police have escorted a man off the plane ! fair enough mate due to the media they have escorted a man off the plane ! and man u flight has just landed ! has been circling i knew that though but when it's on approach isn't it the main priority to get it on the ground though ? priority to have the plane on the ground ! then there obviously going to land at manchester ! when one of the corespondents say on the news why didn't the plane land at standsted when it was due to land at man anyway it's the main.... i love how to media escalate everything out of control ! and how much information they don't know ! your in for a long afternoon mate ! hope your ok and everyone onboard is ok ! think someone has been circling around manchester for a bit ! due to the security scare onboard another aircraft there's your answer to the airport being closed a supposed device onboard an aircraft bound for man !
